thread.title: How Twitter reacted to 'the Normal One' Jurgen Klopp
thread.title_full: How Twitter reacted to 'the Normal One' Jurgen Klopp

title: How Twitter reacted to 'the Normal One' Jurgen Klopp
text:
How Twitter reacted to 'the Normal One' Jurgen Klopp By The Insider (columnist) 09 Oct 2015 10:52:00 
reads 
Jurgen Klopp addressed the media on Friday morning for the first time since his appointment as Liverpool manager. 
His declaration that he was the 'normal one' quickly led to the hashtag #NormalOne trending on Twitter. 
Here's some of the best social media reaction to Klopp's first public outing as Reds boss: 
"Never ever seen a better press conference from a new manager! The energy, how he speaks, everything! Give this guy time! What a man! @LFC" 
Former Reds player John Arne Riise @JARiiseOfficial 
"Think Liverpool have got a great manager and character in jurgen klopp.. Looking forward to seeing how it goes.?!!" 
Four-time World Superbike champion Carl Fogarty @carlfogarty 
"Jurgen Klopp has just won the heart of the nation in 1 Press conference.... Really hope he is successful.... #Klopp" 
Former England cricket captain Michael Vaughan @MichaelVaughan 
"Great entry from Klopp. Very impressive. Charismatic, strong, entertaining. Fasten your seat belts @LFC. Media masterclass. #TheNormalOne" 
Former Football Association director of communications Adrian Bevington @ABevington11 Related Sport News
